title: High country
creator_credit: George Miller, Geoff Burrowes and Yenan Productions
brief_description: A group of amateur horsemen cross Victoria’s Great Dividing Range using a little frequented track. Shows without commentary, the grandeur and mystique of the region. Music by Mario Mills and Jon English
creator_credit_for_label: George Miller, Geoff Burrowes and Yenan Productions
